screen.name: MessageBox-template
screen.applet:
# this should be factored out into some helper code,but currently demonstrates applets. from enigma import eSize,ePoint, getDesktop #orgwidth = self.instance.size().width() #orgheight = self.instance.size().height() #--- offset_listposx = 15 offset_listposy = 135 offset_listwidth = 15 offset_listheight = 50 offset_textwidth = 255 offset_textheight = 36 min_width = 600 min_height = 75 #---- deskwidth = getDesktop(0).size().width() deskheight = getDesktop(0).size().height() textsize = self["text"].getSize() textwidth = textsize[0] + offset_textwidth textheight = textsize[1] + offset_textheight
listwidth = 0 listheight = 0
if self.list: try: for i in self.list: if len(i[0]) > listwidth: listwidth = len(i[0]) listwidth = listwidth * offset_listwidth listheight = len(self.list) * offset_listheight except: pass
if (min_height > textheight): textheight = min_height if (min_width > textwidth): textwidth = min_width if (listheight > 0): offset = 38 else: offset = 20 if (textwidth > listwidth): wsizex = textwidth + offset_listposx * 2 else: textwidth = listwidth - offset_listposx wsizex = listwidth + offset_listposx
wsizey = textheight + listheight + offset
if ((wsizey + offset_listposy - offset_listposx) > deskheight): textheight = deskheight - listheight - offset - offset_listposy + offset_listposx wsizey = textheight + listheight + offset
if (wsizex > deskwidth): textwidth = deskwidth - offset_listposx * 2 listwidth = wsizex = deskwidth
wsize = (wsizex,wsizey + offset_listposy - offset_listposx)
# resize self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize))
# resize label textsize = (textwidth,textheight) self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize))
# move list listsize = (wsizex - offset_listposx * 2,listheight) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(offset_listposx,textheight + offset_listposy)) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize))
# center window newwidth = wsize[0] newheight = wsize[1] self.instance.move(ePoint(int(deskwidth - newwidth)/2,int(deskheight - newheight)/2))

widget.convert: {"templates": {"default": (45,[ MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (8, 5), size = (45, 45), png = 2), # index 2: picture MultiContentEntryText(pos = (60, 0), size = (990, 45), font=0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT|RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text = 1), # index 1: text MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (938, 6), size = (113, 35), png = 5, flags = BT_SCALE), # index 5: stream-logo ]), "default_without_picon": (45,[ MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (8, 5), size = (45, 45), png = 2), # index 2: picture MultiContentEntryText(pos = (60, 0), size = (990, 45), font=0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT|RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text = 1), # index 1: text ]), "info": (45,[ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (8, 2), size = (255, 45), font=0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT|RT_VALIGN_CENTER, border_width = 0, text = 0), # index 1: text MultiContentEntryText(pos = (270, 2), size = (780, 45), font=0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT|RT_VALIGN_CENTER, color=0xf47d19,color_sel=0xf47d19, border_width = 0, text = 1) ],False), "menus": (45,[ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (8, 0), size = (1043, 45), font=0, flags = RT_HALIGN_CENTER|RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text = 1), # index 1: text ]), "about": (45,[ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (0, 0), size = (1050, 45), font=0, flags = RT_HALIGN_CENTER|RT_VALIGN_CENTER, color=0xf47d19,color_sel=0xf47d19, border_width = 0, text = 0) ],False), "genre": (45,[ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (8, 0), size = (1043, 45), font=0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT|RT_VALIGN_CENTER, border_width = 0, text = 1) ]) }, "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 30),gFont("Regular", 29)], "itemHeight": 45 }
